TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompatibleFramework extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a version of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.
Specifies the profile of the .NET Framework version where an application can install and run.
Docs.value: A string that represents the profile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the .NET Framework version is [!INCLUDE[net_client_v40_long](~/includes/net-client-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CompatibleFramework.Profile%2A> property returns "Client". If the .NET Framework version is [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CompatibleFramework.Profile%2A> property returns "Full".

Docs.summary: Specifies the runtime version number of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.
Docs.value: A string that represents the runtime version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks New versions of the .NET Framework may operate on previously-released versions of the runtime.

Docs.summary: Specifies the version of the .NET Framework where an application can install and run.
Docs.value: A string that represents the version.
